Dataset link: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/rdoume/beerreviews

Informative Project title: Predicting the Popularity of Different Beers

The team Name: Stout-asticians

Research Goal (with short description): The goal of this project is to predict the future popularity of beers given certain factors. We will be analyzing a dataset to determine which keywords, type, brand, aroma, style, apperance, taste and so forth affect what beers people prefer. Using this will we create predictions on beer popularity.
